Any referral code for maybank visa platinum card ?

1) The first step is to temporarily block a DBS card via the DBS digibank app. You can do this by tappingMoreon the bottom right hand corner  then scrolling down until you seePayment Controls.Select the card you wish to use  then toggle the card lock option.2) Now go to the merchant and swipe your locked card (or enter your details online  as the case may be). The transaction will fail since your card is locked. Thatâ€™s exactly what we want to happen.3) Return to the DBS digibank app or login to DBS ibanking and summon the digibot (for the app  tap the question mark on the top right corner and scroll down to tap â€œask digibotâ€  for desktop  click the icon at the bottom right corner).4) Navigate toCheck My Recent Transactions>Â Dedit Cards>Select the card you used>View Transaction History>Declined Transactions
